title: Did McConnell say to Democrats "no victories "?
subtitle: The remarks attributed to the majority leader in the Senate were not entirely unreasonable on the basis of his previous statements.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In December 2020, the majority leader of the United States Senate, Mitch McConnell, pledged to prevent democratic legislative efforts, saying, "Even if I feel it is a good bill. They won't have victories."
